ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Neolithic Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make basic neolithic storage benches with faster work speed compared to spots.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Neolithic Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced neolithic storage buildings to enhance efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Medieval Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make medieval storage benches with faster work speed compared to their neolithic predecessors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Medieval Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced medieval storage buildings to enhance efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Industrial Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make industrial storage benches with faster work speed compared to their medieval predecessors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Industrial Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced industrial storage buildings to enhance efficiency.
